mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xmr_user_addresses (user_id, account_index, subaddress_index, subaddress, label, is_active, created_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{accountIndex}, #{subaddressIndex}, #{subaddress}, #{label}, #{isActive}, #{createdTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM xmr_user_addresses WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY account_index ASC, subaddress_index ASC
SELECT * FROM xmr_user_addresses WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_active = 1 ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM xmr_user_addresses WHERE subaddress = #{subaddress} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM xmr_user_addresses WHERE label = #{label} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM xmr_user_addresses WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY created_time DESC
